meanings: pour water into the big pot from the bucket
(돈·물자를) supply a lot of (money, materials), pump ((money)) into

vlive.korean: 넘치는 열정을 쏟아부으며... You pour out your overflowing passion... 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV “TWICE의 MBTI를 찾아서” EP. 미나
vlive.english: You pour out your overflowing passion...

vlive.korean: 내일 한 무대에 네, 쏟아... and pour them into the performance tomorrow. 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) DYEARY EP.08
vlive.english: and pour them into the performance tomorrow.

vlive.korean: [무대 위에서 모든 에너지를 쏟아붓는 JB] 약간... [JB uses up all of his energy on stage] It's like... 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) HOTLINE #18 (Awards Ver.)
vlive.english: [JB uses up all of his energy on stage] It's like...

vlive.korean: 한꺼번에 오늘 다 쏟아놓는다며... Today is the day of unveiling... 듣기 View video WHYNOT TV : 자기야, 나 뭐 달라진 거 없어? [미친 딜리버리 시즌2] EP05 커플 메이크오버
vlive.english: Today is the day of unveiling...

vlive.korean: 오랜만에 펑펑 눈물 쏟아? Should I bawl for the first time in a while? 듣기 View video EXID : [EXID(이엑스아이디)] CUTExid_솔지가 정하는 연애하고 싶은 멤버 1위는!?
vlive.english: Should I bawl for the first time in a while?

examples.korean: The volcano erupted, raining hot ash over a wide area. 발음듣기 화산이 폭발하여 넓은 지역에 뜨거운 화산재를 쏟아 부었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The volcano erupted, raining hot ash over a wide area. 발음

examples.korean: He pumped all his savings into the business. 발음듣기 그는 그 사업에 저축해 둔 돈을 몽땅 쏟아부었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He pumped all his savings into the business. 발음

examples.korean: The tanker began to spill its cargo of oil. 발음듣기 유조선이 싣고 있던 석유를 쏟아 내기 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The tanker began to spill its cargo of oil. 발음

examples.korean: The band shelled out $100000 for a mobile recording studio. 발음듣기 그 밴드는 이동 녹음실에 10만 달러를 쏟아 부었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The band shelled out $100000 for a mobile recording studio. 발음

examples.korean: loudspeakers pumping out rock music 발음듣기 록 음악을 쏟아 내고 있는 확성기 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: loudspeakers pumping out rock music 발음
